title: Sinner returns from doping ban at Italian Open
description: Jannik Sinner is returning from a doping ban at the Italian Open.

title: 'I have some gas left in the tank': At 37, Djokovic still has big tennis goals
description: Djokovic has had a rough start to 2025, but shown flashes of brilliance too. And he's aiming for that 100th tour win.
author: Simon Cambers

title: Draper smashes racquet during hard-fought Rome win
description: Jack Draper beats Vit Kopriva to reach the last 16 of the Italian Open but his frustration boils over during a straight-set win.

title: Raducanu fights back to set up Gauff match in Rome
description: Emma Raducanu fights back to beat Veronika Kudermetova and set up an intriguing fourth-round meeting with Coco Gauff at the Italian Open.

title: Unlock the Perfect Slice Serve - Essential Tennis Podcast #415
description: The wide slice serve is a CRITICAL tool to have in your tool box. It pulls opponents out of position, opens the court up for you to hit into, exposes their usually weaker backhand side, and forces them to run twice as far for the next shot - if they even get it at all. Let’s take a deep dive into how YOU can develop this powerful weapon, step by step in this special episode of the Essential Tennis Podcast.
author: Essential Tennis LLC

title: 3 Djokovic Secrets To Winning More Matches - Essential Tennis Podcast #414
description: In this special episode of the Essential Tennis Podcast, you're going to learn the top 3 tactical secrets of Novak Djokovic that you can apply in your very next match. Use these tools to gain precision, consistency, and offense to make your opponents more uncomfortable, win more points, and win more matches.
author: Essential Tennis LLC

title: What were the Rome tennis results?
description: The 2025 Internazionali BNL d'Italia continued on Sunday, with Lorenzo Musetti, Alexander Zverev and Carlos Alcaraz winning their third-round matches. Arthur Fils defeated Stefanos Tsitsipas and Corentin Moutet stunned Holger Rune. View all the Rome tennis results from Sunday below. title: Musetti/Sonego edge Berrettini brothers in all-Italian doubles clash
description: Some of the top Italian talent in the PIF ATP Rankings took to the doubles court in a popcorn clash Sunday at the Internazionali BNL d'Italia in Rome, where Lorenzo Musetti and Lorenzo Sonego overcame Jacopo Berrettini and Matteo Berrettini 6-7(0), 6-2, 10-8. Top 10 singles star Musetti and World No. 44 Sonego let slip a 5/1 lead in the Match Tie-break before reeling off the four final points of the first-round encounter to down the Berrettini brothers. Musetti and Sonego crucially saved nine of 10 break points they faced in the one-hour, 42-minute clash, according to Infosys ATP Stats. [HOT SHOT] Awaiting the home favourites in the second round at the Foro Italico will be second seeds Harri Heliovaara and Henry Patten, who eased past Flavio Cobolli and Sebastian Korda 6-3, 6-3 for their first Rome win on their second appearance as a team. Kevin Krawietz/Tim Puetz and Marcel Granollers/Horacio Zeballos also notched straightforward wins on a good day for seeded teams in the Italian capital. Second seeds Krawietz and Puetz defeated Sebastian Baez and Alexandre Muller 6-1, 6-2, while fourth seeds and Madrid champions Granollers and Zeballos sunk Yuki Bhambri and Robert Galloway 6-1, 6-2. [NEWSLETTER FORM]

title: Italian Open 2025 Day 5 Recap
description: On Day Five at the Foro Italico, the bottom half of the draw played their round of 32 matches, and it was generally a solid day for the seeds. Third seed Carlos Alcaraz fought through a tight first set to beat Laslo Djere 7-6(2), 6-2 and reach the fourth round to join Zverev (2), Draper …
author: Jonathan

title: Italian Open 2025 Day 4 Recap
description: The second round at the 2025 Italian Open is complete, and Jannik Sinner returned on Saturday after his three-month negotiated doping suspension.  The world number one kicked off with a straightforward enough win over Mariano Navone in the early evening on the Stadio Centrale del Tennis. Elsewhere, there were several seeded casualties with Fritz, Shelton, …
author: Jonathan
